title: Michael Fabricant – 2022 Comments Changing Support to Penny Mordaunt in Conservative Leadership Contest
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Fabricant, the Conservative MP for Lichfield, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
I am deeply disappointed that Boris [Johnson] has chosen not to stand.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence

I shall now nominate Penny Mordaunt to let the members of our great Party decide who should be our Leader and next Prime Minister. I abhor political coronations. They invariably get it wrong.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
